congrats_data.msg: üéâCONGRATULATIONS!üéâ You have earned a badge and completed the goal @results.name. Well done!
congrats_data.extra_msg: Remember, if you need support with the skills you have learned, you can get extra help in the Main Menu. Just type {MENU} and select option 7 to get help with your parenting goals.

congrats_data.msg: üéâYahoo!üéâ Great work, @fields.first_user_name. Here's your certificate to keep and share.
congrats_data.extra_msg: Remember, you can always return to @fields.prog_name and get extra support or review these goals. Just type {MENU}.

congrats_data.msg: Congratulations! You have earned yourself a badge. You are now ready to begin the course. ‚≠ê

certificate_name_data.messages.1.text: üéâYou did it!üéâ You have completed @fields.prog_name and earned yourself a certificate. Congratulations!
How should I print your name on the certificate?
certificate_name_data.validation.conditions.1.condition.name: valid
certificate_name_data.validation.conditions.1.message: This name is too long. Please enter a shorter name.
certificate_name_data.confirmation.question: The name you would like to have on you certificate is @answer. Is that correct?

delivery_messages.msg: Now that you've relaxed, it's time to pick your goal.
delivery_messages.metadata.description: Message after take_a_pause in onboarding before selecting the first goal (if not fixed)

delivery_messages.msg: Today we are taking a break from your goal, @results.name, and checking in on your progress. Press 1 on your keypad to proceed.
delivery_messages.metadata.description: message introducing the post goal check in. Needs to be aligned with whatsapp template "post_goal_checkin". 1 can be replaced by anything (anything typed in the chat will work anyway)

delivery_messages.msg: What kind of activity do you want to try with your child?
delivery_messages.metadata.description: message for choosing which type of activity to do. Types in "activity_type_data"

delivery_messages.msg: Let‚Äôs get started. Press NEXT to begin.
delivery_messages.metadata.description: message received after completing the pre goal/course checkin, before receiving the first module. It has a NEXT button, where NEXT can be replaced by anything  (anything typed in the chat will work anyway)

delivery_messages.msg: These messages don‚Äôt seem to be working. When you are ready to keep going, press 1.
delivery_messages.metadata.description: hook message sent after 3 days of no response from the user. Needs to be aligned with whatsapp template "no_response". 1 can be replaced by anything (anything typed in the chat will work anyway)

description_data.msg: You have completed @fields.c_n_mod_compl out of @fields.c_n_mod skills in this goal. Today you will begin working on the skill @results.name.
In this goal, you will gain @fields.c_n_mod new skills. You will receive a new lesson each day. Today you will begin the first skill, @results.name.
ParentText has @fields.n_goals_prog goals. We will begin with the first goal, @results.name. Once you complete this goal, you can choose which goal you want to work on next. Let's get started.

closing_data.msg: I'm really proud of your effort today. Let‚Äôs build on it tomorrow!

We're making great progress together. See you tomorrow!
Thank you for showing up and doing the work - that matters so much. See you again tomorrow!

You did a great job today. I'll be right here again tomorrow to learn together!
